name: Twitchwatch2
body:
### About
TwitchWatch2 is a cross-platform desktop application geared towrds twitch.tv notifications.
Heres some features implemented as of now
* Streamer status
* Open in browser
* Open with livestreamer

![Preview image](http://i.imgur.com/rexZx9W.png)

### Download latest
Current version: 1.0.2 beta

[Windows installer](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.2%20beta/1.0.2%20win/TwitchWatch2-1.0.2-win-x64.exe)

[OSX disk image](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.2%20beta/1.0.2%20win/TwitchWatch2-1.0.2-installer.dmg.bz2)

[Linux tarball](https://files.osund.com/TwitchWatch2/1.0.2%20beta/1.0.2%20win/TwitchWatch2-1.0.2-linux-x64.tar.gz)

***

### Feedback & Bugs
Please leave feedback or suggestions at michael@osund.com
Report bugs here on github.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
